DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of the long-term treatment of entacapone in patients with Parkinson's disease with end-of-dose wearing-off. This study is not recruiting patients in the United States.
DOC.brief_title: An Extension Study of Entacapone in Patients With Parkinson's Disease With End-of-dose Wearing-off. This Study is Not Recruiting in the United States
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of the long-term treatment of entacapone in patients with Parkinson's disease with end-of-dose wearing-off.
DOC.criteria: Attended the Phase IIb study Able to fill out the patient diary Serious heart, pulmonary, renal, hepatic or gastrointestinal disease Dementia symptoms Pregnant or nursing (lactating) women Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply.
